attributes.action: STOP Funding the World Health Organisation.
attributes.additional_details: We do not believe the WHO is acting in the best interests of the global population.
attributes.background:
Stop with immediate effect all monies and funding paid to the WHO. 
Create an independent UK body to replace the WHO.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314810.
